properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 17 at 3:02AM PST until January 18 at 12:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Rough bar conditions expected.

- GENERAL SEAS...4 to 6 ft early Friday morning. Seas then
build again reaching 8 to 10 ft Friday evening.

- FIRST EBB...Around 1015 AM Friday. Seas to 7 ft.

- SECOND EBB...Around 1030 PM Friday. Seas to 11 ft with
breakers possible.

* WHERE...In the Main Channel of the Columbia River Bar.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to midnight PST tonight.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft
especially when navigating in or near harbor entrances.
properties.instruction:
Small craft should use extreme caution when navigating in or near
harbor entrances.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT
